recentlyCompleted.title: API token usage tracking research
recentlyCompleted.summary: OpenClaw already has built-in tracking via fetchClaudeUsage() → api.anthropic.com/api/oauth/usage. Shows five_hour.utilization and seven_day.utilization. No patching needed.

recentlyCompleted.title: Agent Teams vs Independent Agents documentation
recentlyCompleted.summary: Expanded brain/AGENT_TEAMS.md with real-world comparison from Blofin redesign. Agent Teams win for multi-file same-repo work; OpenClaw subagents win for independent focused tasks.
